about_the_game:
Leo's Cyber World

Leo's Cyber World is a single-player meat pigeon strategy game. In the game, we play as Leo and explore various hardware drivers and system software, through which you learn a series of functions to arm yourself, you can combine them to achieve unexpected results. The initial goal of the game is for Leo to be uploaded to a stand-alone device, in order to achieve the goal of long-term existence.

We move through different tiles by clicking the mouse, each tile represents a different thing, he may be a malicious program that the player needs to destroy, or it may be a ruthless system antivirus program. In this game, players can use their talents to add, with the game's chosen skills to achieve unexpected effects

Free to choose skills

Players can choose their own talents each time they enter a different map, skills will be zeroed and re-selected, but talents will remain, players can use their own wisdom, Combine level characteristics to combine skills for best effect.

Different maps, different gameplay

sequential_01.gif [/img] The game contains different maps, and different maps will have a lot of unexpected gameplay, different plots, new monsters.

Strategy themed combat

Players can use their own only, combined with different talents and skills to achieve the best combat effect
detailed_description:
Leo's Cyber World

Leo's Cyber World is a single-player meat pigeon strategy game. In the game, we play as Leo and explore various hardware drivers and system software, through which you learn a series of functions to arm yourself, you can combine them to achieve unexpected results. The initial goal of the game is for Leo to be uploaded to a stand-alone device, in order to achieve the goal of long-term existence.

We move through different tiles by clicking the mouse, each tile represents a different thing, he may be a malicious program that the player needs to destroy, or it may be a ruthless system antivirus program. In this game, players can use their talents to add, with the game's chosen skills to achieve unexpected effects

Players can choose their own talents each time they enter a different map, skills will be zeroed and re-selected, but talents will remain, players can use their own wisdom, Combine level characteristics to combine skills for best effect.

name: Computer dungeon Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 or equivalent
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统

short_description: the game about a conscious program that explores and grows in the cyber world from the beginning. In the game, we play as Leo and explore various hardware drivers and system software, through which you learn a series of functions to arm yourself, you can combine them to achieve unexpected results.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support
